Preference.app:summary: Customize which stats to prioritize and setting maximum failure percentage.
Choose which Character/Support Cards to detect for the Training Event.
Preference.app:title: Training Event *

Preference.app:summary: Customize OCR-related settings like the accuracy and required confidence.
Preference.app:title: Tesseract OCR Optimization

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Enables prioritizing farming fans via conducting extra races instead of focusing on training.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Enable Prioritizing Farming Fans

SeekBarPreference.app:summary: Set the number in order to determine when to do extra races. Default is every 4 days when applicable.\nEx) 4 % 4 = 0 -> Extra Race can be run.\nEx) 2 % 4 = 2 -> Extra Race cannot be run.
SeekBarPreference.app:title: Set what Days to do Extra Races

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Disable retrying on failed mandatory races and stops the bot. Defaults to disabled.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Disable Retrying on Failed Races

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Enables check to automatically stop the bot when reaching a mandatory race.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Enable Stop on Mandatory Race

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Forces the bot to race extra races for every single day with no rest, mood recovery, or training. Focuses purely on racing.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Force Racing Every Day

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Enables check for a certain Skill Point threshold. If reached, the bot will stop so that you can spend the skill points.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Enable Skill Point Check

SeekBarPreference.app:title: Set Threshold for Skill Point Check

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Enables check for warning popups like lack of fans or lack of trophies gathered.\n\nStops the bot if detected for the user to deal with them manually to prevent potentially ending the run prematurely.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Enable Check for Popups

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Overrides all stat weight prioritization settings and have the bot pick options that give the highest Energy. Will fallback to the current stat weight prioritization settings if no option for that is available.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Prioritize Energy Above All Else

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Allows debugging messages in the log and test images to be created in the /temp/ folder.\n\nIncreases the average runtime of the bot due to constant IO operations.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Enable Debug Mode

SeekBarPreference.app:summary: Set the confidence percentage for template matching. Default is 80% at 1080p. Consider lowering this to something like 70% at lower resolutions.
SeekBarPreference.app:title: Adjust Confidence for Template Matching

SeekBarPreference.app:summary: Manually set the scale as a whole number value to do template matching. The Basic Template Matching Test can help find your recommended scale. Default is 100 or 1.00 based on 1080p.
SeekBarPreference.app:title: Set Scale for Template Matching

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Disables normal bot operations and starts the template match test. Only on the Home screen and will check if it can find various buttons on the screen. It will also output what scale it had the most success with.\n\nRecommended to enable Debug Mode as well.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Start Basic Template Matching Test

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Disables normal bot operations and starts the training failure OCR test. Only on the Training screen and only tests on the training currently on display for their failure chance.\n\nRecommended to enable Debug Mode as well.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Training Failure Chance OCR Test

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Disables normal bot operations and starts the comprehensive training OCR test. Only on the Training screen and tests all 5 trainings for their stat gain weights and failure chances.\n\nRecommended to enable Debug Mode as well.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Comprehensive Training OCR Test

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Hides the log messages regarding the string comparison process.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Hide String Comparison Results
